title: Learn How to Manage Your 3D Projects Using Notion

media:group.media:title: Learn How to Manage Your 3D Projects Using Notion
media:group.media:description:
Notion is an amazing tool for project management and in this video we cover how you can build your own project management tool which is perfect for your exact needs. This works for short films, smaller studios and personal projects - and much more!
